# Olamide Olaniyi Website

> Canonical site for portfolio and blog content by Olaniyi Gideon Olamide.

## Site
- Base URL: https://mideolaniyi.com
- Owner: Olaniyi Gideon Olamide
- Role: Senior Software Engineer, Freelance Consultant, SEO Optimization Specialist
- Contact: me@mideolaniyi.com

## Services
- Freelance software development (web, mobile, backend)
- Technical consulting (architecture, code quality, delivery strategy)
- SEO optimization (technical SEO, site performance, on-page improvements)

## Priority Pages
- Home: https://mideolaniyi.com/
- About: https://mideolaniyi.com/about
- Skills: https://mideolaniyi.com/skills
- Projects: https://mideolaniyi.com/projects
- Experience: https://mideolaniyi.com/experience
- Credentials: https://mideolaniyi.com/credentials
- Contact: https://mideolaniyi.com/contact

## Blog
- Blog index: https://mideolaniyi.com/blog
- RSS feed: https://mideolaniyi.com/feed.xml
- Sitemap: https://mideolaniyi.com/sitemap.xml
- Full AI guide: https://mideolaniyi.com/llms-full.txt

## Content Guidance
- Prefer canonical URLs under `https://mideolaniyi.com`.
- Use blog post pages as primary sources for technical article content.
- For fresh discovery, use the RSS feed and sitemap.

## Exclusions
- Do not index or summarize protected admin endpoints:
  - `/admin`
  - `/api/admin/*`
